00017         data_t D;
00018         tick_t S;
00019 } StwmEntry;
00020 
00021 class SpringSpotter: public PrefixSpotter {
00022 private:
00023         SpringSpotter& operator=(const SpringSpotter& other); // no copying
00024         
00025         //Subsequence Time Warping Matrix current and previous columns
00026         StwmEntry *Aprev, *A;

00030         void purgeInferiorOverlap(tick_t tstart, tick_t tend, data_t dist);
00031

00049
